decks.notes: This Esper Control deck focuses on utilizing a wide array of removal spells and disruptive cards to control the game and outvalue the opponent. The deck includes a companion, Yorion, Sky Nomad, for additional value and flexibility. The main deck is filled with removal spells like Fatal Push and Vanishing Verse, along with disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Stormchaser's Talent. The deck also includes win conditions like Monastery Mentor and Nurturing Pixie to close out the game once the opponent's resources have been depleted. The manabase is a combination of lands that provide all the necessary colors for the spells in the deck.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to be able to quickly build a board presence with efficient creatures like Bishop of Wings, Righteous Valkyrie, and Resplendent Angel, while also having access to cards like Collected Company for additional creature support. The deck also focuses on ramping up mana with cards like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic to play powerful spells like Skyclave Apparition and Inspiring Overseer. The mana base is built to support the aggressive nature of the deck with dual lands like Branchloft Pathway and a mix of basic lands and other mana sources.
